about_the_game:
Complete Roseate Chest
Step into the flower patches and find yourself some lovely roses to liven up your attire with their bright red hue.

Includes
  • Winona's Roseate Skin Set
  • Willow's Roseate Skin Set
  • Woodie's Roseate Skin Set
  • Wurt's Roseate Skin Set
  • Wendy's Roseate Skin Set
  • Wormwood's Roseate Skin Set
  • Wathgrithr's Roseate Skin Set
  • Wes's Roseate Skin Set
  • Webber's Roseate Skin Set
  • Wanda's Roseate Skin Set
  • Wolfgang's Roseate Skin Set
  • Wx78's Roseate Skin Set
  • Wilson's Roseate Skin Set
  • Wickerbottom's Roseate Skin Set
  • Waxwell's Roseate Skin Set
  • Wortox's Roseate Skin Set
  • Walter's Roseate Skin Set
  • Warly's Roseate Skin Set

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
